system.description:
This spell allows the cleric to temporarily wield the magical powers of a magic-user, enabling the use of certain restricted items.

Effects:

  • The cleric may use one magic-user-only item, choosing between:
    • A magic-user device (such as a wand, staff, or rod).
    • A magic-user scroll containing a 1st or 2nd level spell.
  • Spell Level Restriction: The cleric cannot use spells of 3rd level or higher, even if present on the scroll.

Duration:

  • The spell lasts for one turn (10 minutes) or until the cleric uses the item.

Temporary Knowledge:

  • During the spellâ€™s duration, the cleric magically understands how to operate the selected item.
  • For a scroll spell, the cleric is treated as the minimum level required to cast the spell.
system.effect: Allows the use of one magic-user device or scroll spell
